title: Where are my stats riot =/
body:
I have over 4k normal wins i go to profile and i dont even have an option to view them. This is the second time that riot has wiped my stats. First time before season 1 and now since the new client that i truthfully hate very much.. 

I can tolerate some things being changed but how much of its core will you change? 
I can barely follow the new rune lay out.

If ranked stats are the only things you guys care about then PLEASE LET ME KNOW SO I CAN LEAVE YOUR GAME!
Im tired of all these updates that barely improve my playing experience. 
I know im not talking to the same people that ran this game back in the day.
But please be a little more understanding for the players that have been here even before you started to work here.

{{champion:27}} is still angry about his poison.

replies.body: I haven't heard anything about stats being wiped.  The updated client doesn't not have historical stats available, so that info isn't visible now.  I'm not how far that implementation is on their radar, but hit up our devs with any feedback through our[ client discussion boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Thanks for sharing your thoughts on that.
